mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid, userpw, username, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth FROM tbl_member3 mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member3_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member3( userid, userpw, username, usergender, usertelnum, userbirthday,useraddress) values (#{userId},#{userPw},#{userName}, #{userGender},#{userTelnum},#{userBirthday},#{userAddress})
INSERT INTO tbl_member3_auth(userid, auth) values (#{userId}, 'ROLE MEMBER')
